text:
slide server sends the principal hrefs encoded to the client
but the client doesn't decode them.
This causes an error with "+" signs in a group principal
creator: dirk.verbeeck@pandora.be

text:
The server sends the '+' sign unencoded and the client replaces it with a space
(org.apache.util.URLUtil.URLDecode).
I did not have a look at the server code yet, so there are two options from my
perspective.
1) The server should encode the principal href correctly.
or
2) If the server does not encode the href, there is no need to call URLDecode on
the client side.

I think the second way is preferable. Any thoughts?
creator: ib@fiz-chemie.de
